sn35.183-185:1.1: “Yo, bhikkhave, anatta, tatra vo chando pahatabbo, rago pahatabbo, chandarago pahatabbo.
sn35.183-185:1.3: Rupa, bhikkhave, anatta; tatra vo chando pahatabbo, rago pahatabbo, chandarago pahatabbo.
sn35.183-185:1.8: dhamma anatta; tatra vo chando pahatabbo, rago pahatabbo, chandarago pahatabbo.
sn35.183-185:1.9: Yo, bhikkhave, anatta tatra vo chando pahatabbo, rago pahatabbo, chandarago pahatabbo”ti.
